Reference

Find Data

Functions that can be used to find data

find_stations()

Find nearest stations using a point's coordinates

Download tables

Funtions that retrieve tibbles with Hydroscope’s data for a given data source

get_stations() get_timeseries() get_instruments() get_water_basins() get_water_divisions() get_political_divisions() get_variables() get_units_of_measurement() get_time_steps() get_owners() get_instruments_type() get_station_type() get_database()

Get tibbles from Hydroscope

Download time series

Retrieve a tibble with time series’ values from Hydroscope

get_data()

Get time series values in a tibble

Miscellaneous functions

Internal functions and helpers

hydro_coords()

Convert coordinates from Hydroscope's points to a tibble

hydro_translate()

Translate Greek names and terms to English
